title: Cash App
description:
Cash App is the easy way to send, spend, save, and invest* your money. Download Cash App and create an account in minutes.

SEND AND RECEIVE MONEY INSTANTLY AT NO COST

With Cash App, you can send, request, and receive money from friends and family. It‚Äôs easy to pay friends or split rent with roommates.

GET INSTANT DISCOUNTS

Cash App Card is the only free* debit card with exclusive discounts on everyday spending. Pay with your card to save instantly at places you already shop, in person and online. Find offers right in the app‚Äîno points, no waiting.

FILE YOUR TAXES FOR FREE

Cash App Taxes makes filing your federal and state returns easy and 100% free‚Äîno hidden fees, no matter your tax situation. File with confidence knowing you get free audit defense and a max refund guarantee. Get your taxes done in minutes from a phone or computer at cash.app/taxes. Deposit your refund into Cash App, and you can get it up to 5 days early. 5 day refund estimate is based on filing data from tax year 2022. Refund windows are subject to change for 2023. We do not guarantee when you will receive your refund. Timing estimates are dependent on the timing of your submission of a complete return and when the IRS submits your refund.

RECEIVE YOUR PAYCHECK UP TO 2 DAYS EARLY

Deposit paychecks, tax refunds, unemployment benefits, stimulus checks, and more into your Cash balance using your account and routing numbers. Deposits arrive up to 2 days faster compared to most banks, plus you can pay bills with your account info. If you deposit $300 or more in paychecks in a month, you‚Äôre eligible to get up to $50 in free overdraft coverage. 

BUY, SELL, SEND, AND RECEIVE BITCOIN

Cash App makes it easy to buy, sell, send, gift, and receive bitcoin (BTC). Start with as little as $1, set up recurring buys, get paid in bitcoin, withdraw to different wallets, or send bitcoin to friends and family with compatible wallets‚Äîeven if they don‚Äôt have Cash App. Pay with bitcoin faster for free using the Lightning Network. Bitcoin services are provided by Block, Inc. (formerly known as Square, Inc.), not Cash App Investing LLC. Purchasing bitcoin involves risk; you may lose money.

BUY & SELL STOCKS COMMISSION-FREE

Start investing and buying stocks with as little as $1.** Track stocks, your investments, and follow companies to keep up with their performance.*** Regulatory and external transfer fees may apply, see the House Rules.

GET A FREE* CUSTOM VISA DEBIT CARD

Design your own Cash App Card and get it by mail. It‚Äôs a customizable, no-hidden-fee, secure Visa debit card that works everywhere Visa is accepted. You‚Äôll also get a virtual card to instantly make purchases. Prepaid debit cards issued by Sutton Bank. ATM withdrawal fees may apply.

START SAVING FOR GOALS

Set goals and save for them automatically, when you want, or with your spare change with Round Ups. Save for a specific goal, or stash cash for a rainy day. It‚Äôs easy to start saving‚Äîno minimum balance, fees, or need for a separate account.

CASH APP FOR EVERYONE 13 AND UP

Now everyone 13 and up can send money to friends, get a Cash App Card, invest, and start saving with an account sponsored by a parent or trusted adult.

*Cash App is a financial services platform, not a bank. Banking services provided by Cash App‚Äôs bank partner(s). Prepaid debit cards issued by Sutton Bank. Free cards come in black or white.

**Fractional shares are not transferable. For additional conditions and limitations, see the Cash App Investing Customer Agreement.

***Brokerage Services are provided by Cash App Investing LLC, member FINRA/SIPC, subsidiary of Block, Inc. Investing involves risk; you may lose money. This is not a recommendation for you to transact in securities. Company names and logos are shown for illustrative purposes only and are not endorsements.

Contact Cash App Support by phone at (800) 969-1940 or mail at:
Block, Inc.
1955 Broadway, Suite 600
Oakland, CA 94612

summary: P2P. Banking. Bitcoin. Stocks.
recentChanges: Various bug fixes and improvements.
comments: At this point I can't get passed the screen that's green with a white $ in the middle. Can't click anything. All started after updating. They claim its my device which is a newer device and was just fine until yesterday. I try to access online, but I don't get anywhere. I call and they keep saying the same thing. Update I called to close account, and the gentleman I talked to said it wasn't my phone and sent it higher up. Update again they reached out and are working on it.

Easy to use app to pay or request money and keep track of everything. Easily displays your accumulated balance, which can be easily transferred to your bank account. If there are no or insufficient funds, you simply withdraw them from your connected bank account. What I don't like is that I don't like to see other people's transactions between your connections, which means others can also see mine, so you need to be careful with your transaction descriptions or change your privacy settings

I'm in the US yet this app continuously says "cash not available in your region" extremely inconvenient when it happens randomly without rhyme or reasoning. (Added later) I don't wanna go to support literally every time the app doesn't work right, just make an app that works 100% of the time. Venmo doesn't have this problem. Maybe yall could take some notes from them.

Great services, not great customer service. Things I enjoy about the app are the automatic round-up savings, interest-earning savings account, overdraft protection, the "Borrow" feature, and ease of sending and receiving money. Unfortunately things I cannot recommend this app for, in particular, is paying for hotels that have security deposits (that are later supposed to come off, but take forever), and the customer service via Chat, which was frankly rude despite my attempts to be courteous.

Best online money app I've ever used. Even though they take a dollar every time you put money on your card through a store or transfer it from your cash app to your bank it's a small price to pay for the very non-restrictive limitations otherwise in play. I absolutely adore the ability to lock and unlock the account at my own will. That is very "clutch" at repelling those extra or repeat charges for subscriptions you don't really want to be a part of but sometimes forget to cancel.

title: PayPal - Send, Shop, Manage
description:
More ways to PayPal‚Äî It‚Äôs a simple and secure way to get paid back, send money to friends, discover cashback offers from brands you love, manage your account and more.

FIND DEALS RIGHT IN THE APP
‚Ä¢ Stack your rewards ‚Äì Get cashback offers3 from brands you love and keep collecting your eligible credit card rewards** on top of it all 
3Eligible items only. Redeem points for cash or other options. Terms and exclusions apply. See PayPal Rewards terms and conditions at PayPal.com/rewards-terms. **Subject to issuer‚Äôs rewards program terms PayPal rewards are subject to applicable terms: paypal.com/us/legalhub/pp-rewards-program-tnc

SEND AND REQUEST MONEY FOR FREE
‚Ä¢ When funded by a bank account or with your PayPal balance, it‚Äôs free to send money or get paid back by friends and family in the US on PayPal 
‚Ä¢ Request money securely from friends or family and personalize your payments

EARN UNLIMITED 3% CASH BACK
‚Ä¢ Earn an unlimited 3% cash back1 when you use the PayPal Cashback Mastercard(R) for PayPal purchases-unlimited cash back, no rotating categories, no annual fee2
‚Ä¢ Apply for your card, manage your account, and redeem your cash back in the app.
1Subject to credit approval.  See Rewards Program Terms for details and eligibility criteria found at: https://www.synchronycredit.com/gecrbterms/html/PayPalCashbackRewardsTerms.htm
2 For New Accounts:  Variable Purchase APRs are 20.24%, 29.24% and 32.24%.  Minimum Interest Charge is $2.  APRs are accurate as of August 1, 2023, and will vary with the market based on Prime Rate.  
Learn more at https://paypal.com/cashbackcard

GROW YOUR MONEY WITH HIGH-YIELD SAVINGS
‚Ä¢ Roll your money into PayPal Savings and earn a current 4.30% APY‚Äìthat‚Äôs 9x the national average*.
‚Ä¢ Easily manage your account right from the app. Transfer money in and out, set individual goals, and track your progress as your savings grows. 
*As of June 07, 2023, the annual percentage yield (APY) for PayPal Savings is 4.30%. This is a variable rate and can change at any time, including after the account is opened. National average source: FDIC National Rates and Rate Caps as of February 20, 2024. https://www.fdic.gov/resources/bankers/national-rates/#one PayPal is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking service provided by Synchrony Bank, Member FDIC. PayPal Balance account is required to use PayPal Savings.

TRACK ORDERS STRAIGHT TO YOUR DOORSTEP
‚Ä¢ Auto-track your packages even if you didn‚Äôt pay with PayPal and get live updates each step of the way
‚Ä¢ Simply link your Gmail account to track your packages or add tracking details manually in the app if it didn't update automatically. Not all sellers are participants.

PAY IN 4 WITH PAYPAL
‚Ä¢ Buy now and pay later by splitting your purchase into 4 interest-free payments at millions of online retailers with no late fees
‚Ä¢ Payments are easy to manage in the app. Pay in 4 is available upon approval for purchases of $30 - $1500 and is currently not available to residents of MO or NV. 18 years old or older to apply. PayPal, Inc.: Loans to CA residents are made or arranged pursuant to a CA Financing Law License. GA Installment Lender Licensee, NMLS #910457. RI Small Loan Lender Licensee. NM residents: Go to paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/campaigns/newmexicodisclosure. Learn more atpaypal.com/payin4

TRUST PAYPAL SECURE TRANSACTIONS
‚Ä¢ PayPal helps keep your financial information secure, with commercially available encryption and fraud protection

Availability of features varies by market

summary: The PayPal app is the secure way to send and receive money, shop and pay in 4.
recentChanges: Do more with PayPal, with more power packed into a single app. Shop the world with ease, send payments near and far, and much more. Find what matters to you and keep track of it more easily by downloading the latest version of the app.
comments: I have used PayPal for and it has been great. But, since I've used the pay in 4 option. I have been dealing with problems. Last night I tried to use the pay in 4 option for a payment, and was granted but my phone cut out of service. I went back today to do it and was denied. When I looked in my connected account, the deposit amount was taken from yesterday and the DENIED attempts today. I have tried calling and texting to fix this because I have pending transactions and can't go on.

I understand the need for security, but the system is way too over the top. Sometimes if you just barely miss something it takes you 20 minutes to get past. Secondly, the website said it couldn't understand my request, so it's not smart enough to connect to google pay. Third, I can't add any of my cards. It keeps saying that that I have insufficient funds(Even though it said I didn't have to pay for anything) or that I need to add a different card, even though my card was VISA.

They suck now. Their security methods are exhausting with all those little pictures to prove you're human. I've been told that they steal your information from your phone when they make you do those puzzles. Also, they changed the app so now I can't find my PayPal Credit balance in the app. I have to go online. And just because my balance went up to $90, it resulted in a 39 point drop on my credit score.

if you actually need the money someone's sending you, you're better off using almost any other platform. PayPal will decide arbitrarily to send payments as an "e-check" which just means it's going to take a week to be put into your account for no reason. plus they're constantly trying to get you to sign up for credit cards and such and will bug you multiple times per transaction to do so. thinking about getting cashapp to avoid the wait times and constant popup bombardment

What happened? it was good in the past. Most of the auto fill fields don't work. The lag from my click to display keeps me doubting if it registered me clicking on something. Less than 10% of the home screen is relevant to me. Changing addresses and card information is more difficult than it needs to be. I just use this for casual payments and it's a process anytime I use PayPal, I almost gave up on a $30 purchase today just because of all the friction, it took me almost 5 minutes to pay!

title: Chime ‚Äì Mobile Banking
description:
Chime is the banking app that has your back. Keep your money safe with security features, overdraft up to $200 fee-free*, and get paid early with direct deposit^, with no monthly fees‚Ä°.

Chime is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking services provided by The Bancorp Bank or Stride Bank, N.A.; Members FDIC

TRUSTED BY MILLIONS
Stay in control of your money with instant transaction and daily balance alerts. Plus, enable two-factor authentication and block your card in a single tap.

OVERDRAFT UP TO $200*
When your balance is running low, the last thing you need is an overdraft fee. Eligible members on Chime can overdraft up to $200* on debit card purchases and ATM withdrawals fee-free.

NO MONTHLY FEES‚Ä°
Chime has no monthly maintenance fees, minimum balance fees, or foreign transaction fees. Plus, access 60k+ fee-free ATMs at locations like Walgreens, 7-Eleven, CVS, and more.

GET PAID UP TO 2 DAYS EARLY
Get your paycheck up to two days early^ with direct deposit, earlier than you would with some traditional banks.

A NEW WAY TO BUILD CREDIT
Use Credit Builder¬π to increase your FICO¬Æ Score by an average of 30 points¬≤ with regular on-time payments. No interest, no annual fees, no credit check to apply.

PAY ANYONE WITH NO TRANSFER FEES
Send money to friends and family ‚Äì with no transfer fees.
‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì
Banking services provided by The Bancorp Bank or Stride Bank, N.A., Members FDIC. The Chime Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank or Stride Bank pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. The Chime Visa¬Æ Credit Builder Card is issued by Stride Bank pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Debit card and Credit card may be used everywhere Visa credit cards are accepted.

*Chime SpotMe is an optional, no fee service that requires a single deposit of $200 or more in qualifying direct deposits to the Chime Checking Account each month. All qualifying members will be allowed to overdraw their account up to $20 on debit card purchases and cash withdrawals initially, but may be later eligible for a higher limit of up to $200 or more based on member's Chime Account history, direct deposit frequency and amount, spending activity and other risk-based factors. Your limit will be displayed to you within the Chime mobile app. You will receive notice of any changes to your limit. Your limit may change at any time, at Chime's discretion. Although there are no overdraft fees, there may be out-of-network or third party fees associated with ATM transactions. SpotMe won't cover non-debit card transactions, including ACH transfers, Pay Anyone transfers, or Chime Checkbook transactions. See Terms and Conditions.

‚Ä°Out-of-network ATM withdrawal fees may apply except at MoneyPass ATMs in a 7-Eleven, or any Allpoint or Visa Plus Alliance ATM.

^Early access to direct deposit funds depends on the timing of the submission of the payment file from the payer. We generally make these funds available on the day the payment file is received, which may be up to 2 days earlier than the scheduled payment date.

¬πTo be eligible to apply for Credit Builder, you need to have received a qualifying direct deposit of $200 or more to your Checking Account within 365 days of your Credit Builder application. See http://chime.com/applycb for details on qualifying direct deposit.

¬≤Based on a representative study conducted by Experian¬Æ, members who made their first purchase with Credit Builder between June 2020 and October 2020 observed an average FICO¬Æ Score 8 increase of 30 points after approximately 8 months. On-time payment history can have a positive impact on your credit score. Late payment may negatively impact your credit score.

Chime received the highest 2021 Net Promoter Score among competitors in the industry according to Qualtrics¬Æ.

Address: 101 California Street, Suite 500, San Francisco, CA 94111, United States. 
No customer support available at HQ. Customer support details available on the website.

summary: Banking with no monthly fees, fee-free overdraft, and early payday.
recentChanges: Mo‚Äô money, mo‚Äô feelings. That‚Äôs the Pisces version of the song, right? The astrological season of all-of-the-feels is upon us. Sure, don‚Äôt forget to tend to those emergency savings funds, but also double down on your daydreams. Light your manifesting money candle and go with your (cash) flow, not theirs. This week‚Äôs app update is a vibe AND reality check. It‚Äôs your boundary BFF, keeping the bugs and glitches out of your account. That way, you get more emo time with your vision board‚Ä¶obviously.
comments: super easy to use, withdrawal money, and send money. not to mention the spot me which is fee free you're just asked to tip to help others as well. I've had for almost 6 years and haven't had a problem. easy to dispute any charges and can control everything by app. would highly recommend to anyone. credit builder built my credit 100 points within 6 months.

Qs far as Checking and savings accounts go, I've had a few issues but uexpected after banking 3+ years. But about a year ago I switched jobs and my new direct deposit started going here. Then all of a sudden my Credit Builder Card gets denied they closed my Credit Builder accout for no payment!! I forgot to add my direct deposit to take a portion of $ out which was shown as nonpayment! It's a Damn prepaid credit card, how can you not make a payment on a prepaid card. There NO payments to miss!!

I love Tha different accounts, checking, credit builder and savings. easy to instantly transfer money between them, as much as you want and often as you want for free. nothing builds credit faster. also free boosts, go negative without penalty, you can earn money when your friends n family join with a direct deposit. I'll never use a bank again!!!

They make it easy to move money between accounts and pay others across multiple platforms. If needed they offer free overdraft protection that comes in handy if money is tight. The credit builder card is fantastic to help build or repair your credit rating. They also have great rewards for referrals. I would recommend Chime to anyone.

I've have physical bank buildings in my area to choose from. However, NONE of them were as friendly and helpful as Chime. The option to turn off all transactions is WONDERFUL. I admit when I first started my Chime account, I was skeptical. Due to the fact theres no physical building (in driving distance) if I did have a problem. On the few occasions, I needed to talk to someone a Chime representative was there. Gotta say thank you, Chime, for always having my back. Plus, my credit is going up!

title: Venmo
description:
Venmo is the fast, safe, social way to pay and get paid. Join over 83 million people who use the Venmo app today. 

SEND AND RECEIVE MONEY  
Pay and get paid for anything from your share of rent to a gift. Add a note to each payment to share and connect with friends. 

SPLIT A REQUEST AMONG MULTIPLE VENMO FRIENDS
You can now send a payment request to multiple Venmo friends at once and customize the amount each person owes.

SHOP WITH THE VENMO DEBIT CARD
Get a debit card that gets YOU. Earn automatic cashback when you spend with Venmo Debit Card at some of your favorite merchants.¬π No monthly fee, no minimum balance.¬≤ 
 
GET REWARDED WITH THE VENMO CREDIT CARD  
Automatically earn 3% cash back on your eligible top spend category, 2% on the next, and 1% on the rest.¬≥  

BUY CRYPTO WITH AS LITTLE AS $1

recentChanges: Fresh new upgrade alert! This release contains bug fixes and improvements, stay tuned for more.
comments: I was somewhat tricked into opening a Venmo credit account. All I wanted to do was pay a friend for a meal. I opened the app and was prompted to enter my address and income. Yes, I probably should have stopped and asked "why" but I was tired and thought they just wanted updated information. Turns out I opened a credit account. Support is all offshore and nearly useless. I was able the close the account but minor damage was done to my credit history because of this.

Works fine, but SUPER annoying that I can't change top friends. My top friends are all people that I've venmoed once or twice almost 4 years ago, meanwhile I have to search manually for the friends I pay twice a week every single time. Why can't I edit my top friends? Or at the very least, why doesn't it automatically update to include people that I've paid in the last month üò≠ super annoying, it's making me consider using a different app

Payments have been fine, but I've never been able to pay anyone with my venmo balance or do an automatic transfer. I can only do a bank transfer or pay from my bank. I sent in documents for identity verification specifically for these reasons, but it's been at least half a year or more since I sent them in and nothing. Supposed to be 2-3 days for a response....yeah, okay. I've sent in several submissions to customer service asking about it and no response whatsoever. Customer service is a joke.

For sending money to friends, great app. But lots of problems all the time with using the debit card attached to my account as well as funding the account. Sometimes it just won't work, no matter what. And customer service isn't open a lot of the time. When they are they make it hard as hell to reach a live person, then when you finally can all they say is sorry, they can't tell me why it's not working at this time and try again later. No solutions. So other than sending money it sucks.

Venmo apparently is owned or a part of PayPal. However, it does not function anywhere near as well as PayPal. With PayPal, it's easy to get a hold of support in the event you have a problem via chat. You can't do that with venmo, you have to call them and navigate their phone assistant and hopefully if you hit the right number you will get a hold of a human. I hate venmo.

title: Zelle
description:
Zelle¬Æ has partnered with leading banks and credit unions across the U.S. to bring you a fast, safe and easy way to send money to friends and family. Money moves quickly - directly from bank account to bank account. If your bank or credit union offers Zelle, you already have it in your mobile banking app or online banking ‚Äì if they don‚Äôt, the Zelle app will make it easy for you to send money to enrolled Zelle users that already have access through their financial institution.

Zelle. This is how money moves¬Æ.

Using just your recipient‚Äôs email address or U.S. mobile number, you can settle up simply and safely with almost anyone you know and trust. Even better, Zelle does not charge any fees to use the service. (Mobile carrier or bank fees may apply).

GET STARTED:
1.	Download the Zelle app.
2.	Enroll using a Visa¬Æ or Mastercard¬Æ debit card linked to a U.S. checking account; or 
3.	Enroll your U.S. checking account by using your online banking username and password, if your bank supports this feature*.
4.	Choose a person to pay, or request money from, by entering their U.S. mobile number or email address.
5.	Confirm the amount and hit send. If they‚Äôre already enrolled with Zelle, they‚Äôll typically get the money in minutes. If they aren‚Äôt, they will be notified and can follow a few simple steps to complete the payment. 

*Some banks allow customers to enroll in the Zelle app using their online or mobile banking username and password.

Zelle and the Zelle related marks and logos are property of Early Warning Services, LLC

You must have a bank account in the U.S. to use Zelle.

recentChanges: We make regular updates to our application to introduce new features, fix bugs, and enhance performance.
comments: This App is completely unusable. Once you get to the create password section, it won't allow me to type in a password. My keyboard completely disappears and it looks like it's glitching out. I've uninstalled and reinstalled it multiple times, annnnd restarted my phone. Still won't work. I tried doing the "copy and paste trick" that I read on another review but no luck. I'm beyond frustrated!

It's hit or miss with this app. I get error messages when trying to send people money, can't find them even though they're in my contacts, and they can't find me. I just had to send requests to friends for payments they were trying to send me.....we'll see if that works. Sometimes, the app works for me ,sometimes, it doesn't. Frustrating!

I can anymore with zelle, why does it work only on and off. I love zelle, but if I don't use it on a regular basis, it doesn't function for whatever reason. I just checked to see if there was a new update that I needed, but no doesnt show one. It has me logged out, but I can click the sign in button. Everytine it seems like I will have to Uninstaller and re install, which makes you lose all previous zelle history and contacts. Zelle you need to get it together

At first I experienced the password issue like everyone else. I solved that issue by typing my password and then copying to the clipboard. I then went back to the zelle app and would hold down on the word password. Slide your finger up just a little bit and the option to paste from clipboard stays available and you can enter your password, thus completing setup.

Less than 1 star. The app won't scan my debit card. It moves the cursor to the beginning after typing first character in many of the fields. It won't keep the keyboard up while trying to enter a password and now is throwing errors when trying to log back in. How does anyone trust this app? Complete garbage!!!

title: TurboTax: File Your Tax Return
description:
Join the millions who switch to TurboTax every year! Whether our experts prepare your tax return or you do it yourself, we guarantee our calculations are always 100% accurate, or we'll pay any penalties* (1). 

FILE WITH 100% CONFIDENCE

  ‚Ä¢ TAX RETURN LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Whether you get expert help or file yourself, you'll get your max refund, 100% accuracy, & audit support for your return‚Äôs full 7-year lifetime, guaranteed (2).
  ‚Ä¢ DONE RIGHT, WITH OUR TAX EXPERTS: Our TurboTax Live tax experts have an average of 12 years' experience & are always up-to-date on all the latest tax laws. When you choose to work with a Live expert, you can trust that you're in good hands.

OPT FOR EXPERT HELP, OR DO IT YOURSELF
  ‚Ä¢ TurboTax Live Assisted Basic ‚Äì File for $0 with expert help, only with TurboTax. 100% free tax filing & a free tax expert final review. Get unlimited advice from tax experts as you file. ~37% of taxpayers qualify. Form 1040 + limited credits only. Must file by 3/31.
  ‚Ä¢ TurboTax Live Full Service - Let an expert do your taxes start to finish. A local tax expert matched to your unique situation will get your taxes done 100% right - as soon as today. You can even work with the same dedicated tax expert every year.
  ‚Ä¢ TurboTax Live Assisted - Get unlimited expert help as you file. Get unlimited help from tax experts as you file. And, only TurboTax Live Assisted includes a 100% accurate, expert final review at no extra charge.
  ‚Ä¢ Or, file on your own with confidence. When you want to do your own taxes, it's easy with TurboTax. We'll get you your max refund with step-by-step guidance & 100% accurate calculations.
  ‚Ä¢ TurboTax Free Edition - 100% free tax filing, 100% accurate, max refund guarantee even when you file for free. ~37% of taxpayers qualify. Form 1040 + limited credits only.

FILE EASILY WITH SPECIAL FEATURES
  ‚Ä¢ File 30% faster on our app!*
  ‚Ä¢ Get started quickly with easy info uploads. Jumpstart your taxes with last year's info, or snap a photo of your W-2 or 1099-NEC & we'll auto-fill your info.
  ‚Ä¢ Easily import investment activity. Save time & hassle by importing your investment info, including crypto transactions.
  ‚Ä¢ Find every deduction & credit. Searches up to 500 deductions & credits. Based on your helps sync your accounts & import transactions, so you don't miss a single self-employment deduction.
  ‚Ä¢ Spanish-language support: The TurboTax app is now available in Spanish! You can now toggle between English & Spanish & file your taxes in your preferred language. Bilingual experts are also available to help answer your questions or file your taxes for you from start to finish.
  ‚Ä¢ Added deduction support for self-employed customers. Our Deduction Finder feature

DISCLAIMERS 
1. Accuracy, Max Refund, Full Service &  Audit Support Guarantee: See terms of service or  turbotax.com/guarantees for full details.
2. Lifetime Guarantee: A combination of coverage: 100% Accurate Calculations, Maximum Refund & Audit Support Guarantees. All guaranteed for the full 7-year life of your tax return. Individual returns only. See terms of service for details.
3. TurboTax Free Edition & TurboTax Live Assisted Basic available for Form 1040 returns with limited credits only. For more details & to see if you're part of the ~37% who qualify: https://turbotax.intuit.com/corp/mobile-apps/turbotax-disclosures/. Intuit reserves the right to modify or terminate this offer at any time. TurboTax Live Assisted Basic free offer ends 3/31.
*On average, customers using our mobile app take 30% less time to complete their taxes compared to time taken on our website
4. TurboTax does not represent a government entity. The websites for the IRS: https://www.irs.gov, as well as state & local tax authorities: https://ttlc.intuit.com/turbotax-support/en-us/help-article/state-taxes/contact-state-department-revenue/L9qVToi02_US_en_US are the source of information for specific tax requirements.

comments: This app has lots of bugs. I was almost finished and tried to file multi states and it populated earned interest into the wrong state and you can't edit it. Lots of "oops, can't find..." when you click for more info. So I requested a call back. It took only a few minutes to get a call. But the support person couldn't help and he just ghosted me. I kept asking "are you there?" No answer. I've used turbo tax for over 10 years but now I won't use them again.

Originally chose the package that was reduced to free. Then it forced me to upgrade to the expensive package because of some stupid credit that I dont think I even had. Ended up costing way more than I could afford for nothing. It's become hard to navigate when I need to add something; but when I finally found it I wasn't allowed to add or edit anything!!! The way they charge $$$ for nonsense makes it feel more like a scam than help. GO TO A LOCAL PERSON THAT DOES TAXES IT WILL BE CHEAPER!

I apologize, I'm just frustrated. I don't want to influence anyone either way, I was speaking for my experience only and I have used and will continue to use TurboTax I just don't care for the app. I despise this app. I have to go through the whole verification process every time I try to open the app and have to change password each time. I even uninstalled and tried again with same results. This is so stupid...ü§Ø

It was dumb to think an app could do this complex job. I paid and had my files rejected 3 times through TurboTax. I got the exact same forms, paid someone else to file them for me and they went through immediately. Now TurboTax doesn't want to give me a refund for an unused service. Their customer service people are so bad, the hate for their job oozes through the call. I had to let the person know other non customer service jobs exist. Just an awful experience. Unprofessional, and fraudulent.

Was forced to upgrade from free in order to claim a tax "credit". The "upgrade" costs $39... But that only covers federal... You have to upgrade your state taxes, too, even though it's a federal credit and doesn't effect state taxes. On top of that, they charge a $4 fee anytime you use a credit card, so now I'm down about $90... And the tax "credit" that I received for this ridiculous upsell? Exactly $0.... Intuit gets worse every year. I will never recommend any of their software.

NOTICE TO POTENTIAL USERS OF DIGITAL OR VIRTUAL CURRENCIES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO CRO, SHOULD BE FOREWARNED OF A POSSIBLE FINANCIAL LOSS AT THE TIME THAT SUCH CURRENCIES ARE EXCHANGED FOR FIAT CURRENCY DUE TO AN UNFAVORABLE EXCHANGE RATE. A FAVORABLE EXCHANGE RATE AT THE TIME OF EXCHANGE CAN RESULT IN A TAX LIABILITY.

Website: https://www.crypto.com
Address: Foris DAX, Inc.,Suite 2725, Sabadell Financial Center Building, 1111 Brickell Avenue, Miami FL 33131, United States
summary: Complete Missions to Earn Diamonds and Redeem for Extra CRO Rewards
recentChanges:
- Get free Apple gear when you apply for a metal Crypto.com Visa Card
- Redeem a Welcome Pack worth US$500 by completing Missions in your first 90d
comments: Slow. For an App that is sponsored on the big stage of UFC, I expected a way more fluid user experience. The UI is confusing and average at best. Some crypto needs you to buy in specific increments and the app doesn't automatically do that for you, you have to manually adjust. Unacceptable in my opinion. I expected more from this app. In app customer service was responsive so that's good. Deposits worked well. Selling is a little easier than buying. 3/5 ‚≠ê.

Overall misleading marketing practices. I mostly have been trying to use the visa card, but it hardly works anywhere, and there's all these claims about getting cash back but it's at very specific locations and not entire chains. Any money on the card is basically locked up with no way to withdraw it. The quests are expensive. Overall not a beginner friendly app and misleading in many ways. There are much better options available

Log in experience is just downright horrible! What kind of developers decided to let a ads popup cover the bottom half of the number options for entering PIN? I had to verify via email, verify via SMS, then the app asked for PIN which I wasn't able to provide because the popup covered the numbers I needed to enter, and then it locked me out because I failed to log in 3 times! Unbelievable!

High spread, I truly hate the delay in the total asset amount. I do not know why my "option" trades decrease in value by a crazy amount while the price is way over my prediction and increasing. I think this app has a lot of potential, but it definitely needs work still. Would like to see better charts as well it's currently very limited. I'll give it 3 stars for now. Hopefully, changes are made.

Prices don't sync right among other problems. But it has the most crypto though. If issues would be fixed then I'd rate 5 stars."Update"still same problems but worse I've lost $5k+ because of these issues I bought a coin at .011 it went up to .0139+ and It sold for almost the same price I bought it at. made $20 when I should have made $500. currently it's not worth buying/selling a coin unless it 2x's or more because you won't get anything out of it. Tried talking support, no help won't respond.

title: Google Wallet
description:
Google Wallet gives you fast, secure access to your everyday essentials. Tap to pay everywhere Google Pay is accepted, board a flight, go to a movie, and more ‚Äì  all with just your phone. Keep everything protected in one place, no matter where you go.

CONVENIENT

Get what you need fast
+ Three quick ways for accessing your everyday essentials: use your phone‚Äôs quick settings for fast access, open the Wallet app from your homescreen or use Google Assistant when your hands are busy.

Access Google Wallet from your Wear OS watch
+ Get instant access to Wallet on the Wear OS main watch face with complications.

Carry cards, tickets, passes, and more
+ Catch a train, see a concert, or earn rewards at your favorite stores  with a digital wallet that carries more
+ [US Only] Unlock the world around you with a digital wallet that carries your drivers license and digital car keys

What you need, right when you need it
+ Your Wallet can suggest what you need, right when you need it. Get a notification for your boarding pass on the day of travel, so you‚Äôll never have to fumble in your bag again.

HELPFUL

Keep track of receipts
+ Easily find transaction details in Wallet, including smart details like location pulled from Google Maps

Seamless integration across Google
+ Sync your Wallet to keep your Calendar and Assistant up to date with the latest info like flight updates and event notifications
+ Shop smarter by seeing your point balances and loyalty benefits in Maps, Shopping, and more

Get started in a snap
+ Set up is seamless with the ability to import cards, transit passes, loyalty cards and more that you‚Äôve saved on Gmail.

Stay in the know on the go
+ Make boarding flights a breeze with the latest information pulled from Google Search. Google Wallet can keep you posted on gate changes or unexpected flight delays.

SAFE & PRIVATE

A secure way to carry it all
+ Security and privacy are built into every part of Google Wallet to keep all your essentials protected.

Android security you can count on
+ Keep your data and essentials secure with advanced Android security features like 2-Step Verification, Find My Phone, and remotely erasing data.

Tap to pay keeps your card secure
ALT: + When you tap to pay with your Android phone, Google Pay doesn‚Äôt share your real credit card number with the business, so your payment info stays safe.

You‚Äôre in control of your data
+ Easy to use privacy controls allow you to opt-in to sharing information across Google products for a tailored experience.

Google Wallet is available on all Android phones (Lollipop 5.0+), Wear OS and Fitbit devices.
Still have questions? Head over to support.google.com/wallet.

summary: Fast, secure access to everyday essentials like cards, passes or tickets
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Keep everything protected in one place, no matter where you go with the new Google Wallet.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy faster, safer, easier access to essentials like your payment cards, loyalty cards, concert tickets and more ‚Äì all from your Android phone.
comments: I used to use Google Pay all the time and now with the new setup, it to difficult to turn off the NFC. Once you turn it on from the Wallet you have to go like 3 steps deep into the settings menu to turn it off. Gone are the days that you can easily turn it on and off from the pull down menu at the top of in the app. Until this is changed I will go back to using credit cards physically.

It's terrible compared to Google Pay. Doesn't allow for locking the app (apart from the device screen lock). Send/request options gone, as well as tracking. This seems to be a complete jump backward. I'll be uninstalling and continuing to use Google Pay until it goes away in June. If Google Wallet hasn't improved by then, it'll probably be time to switch to Samsung Pay.

Used it to pay for a $35 tank of gas and it showed a transaction amount of over $170. Had to pull up my card details to make sure it didn't over charge. (It didn't). This glitch combined with the lack of security settings (a review and confirmation screen, option to re-enter pin or fingerprint to confirm) these are basic security settings. Google, once a giant has fallen so far.

Still can't add custom Loyalty cards easily in the GOOGLE WALLET app. The workflow is to "take a picture" and use the image to create the custom Loyalty card. Can't comment on the pay portion. I haven't used it in years. It never "just worked" so I gave up and use the card. At one point, the payment wouldn't work with the Android setting "Require device unlock for NFC". No idea if that ever got fixed. Probably not.

Google Wallet is great when it works. But, several times, for no apparent reason, it has stopped working. I use it for my public transit card and have been left numerous times with no way to pay with plenty of money on the card. It is very frustrating and embarrassing. Today, I checked every setting and checked for updates. Everything is set correctly, but Wallet still won't work.

title: Capital One Mobile
description:
What‚Äôs on the Capital One Mobile app? All of your accounts, and so much more.

Whether you‚Äôre out in the world or feeling right at home, you can manage your money with ease:
‚Ä¢ View balances and export statements
‚Ä¢ Pay bills and take care of loans
‚Ä¢ Check in on your credit with CreditWise
‚Ä¢ Activate a credit or debit card when you need it
‚Ä¢ Redeem rewards on the go
‚Ä¢ Send and receive money with friends and family using Zelle¬Æ
 
With the Capital One Mobile app, you can ...
‚Ä¢ Stay informed when you enable alerts and purchase notifications
‚Ä¢ See everything that happens on your card with detailed transactions
‚Ä¢ Instantly lock your credit or debit card from anywhere
‚Ä¢ Get answers from Eno, your Capital One assistant

Download the app for better banking with Capital One.


Internet access is needed to use the mobile app. Check with your Internet service provider for details of specific fees and charges. Service outages may occur. Capital One customers are responsible for regularly checking their account statements. Push, email, and SMS alerts and notifications, including purchase notifications, must be enabled to be received. CreditWise monitoring and alerts may not be available if the information you enter at enrollment does not match the information in your file at one or more consumer reporting agencies or you do not have a file at one or more consumer reporting agencies. Features may not be available to all customers. Actual experiences may differ from those depicted. Additional terms and limitations apply. 

¬© 2023 Capital One, N.A. Member FDIC. Zelle and the Zelle related marks are wholly owned by Early Warning Services, LLC and are used herein under license. To read about the Terms of your download, check out the End User License Agreement.

summary: Bill pay, card lock, check deposit and more - all on the Capital One Mobile app.
recentChanges: Thanks for using Capital One Mobile. We make regular updates to our app to ensure your mobile banking experience is top notch. Each new version of our app includes improvements to make it faster and more reliable, bug fixes and new features which we'll highlight here so you know what's new!
comments: It used to work fine. I check my transactions, schedule payments, and book travel all the time. Recently the app became inoperable, stuck at the logo, a circle just spins and spins, and will not go to the logon page (i'm using fingerprint login, if that matters) I've reinstalled, and tried everything, it still is unusable. Others reported the same problem. Please fix the damn app. I'm seriously thinking of closing the credit card account. It's just too inconvenient to log on from browser.

Loved the app when I first got it, I usually check it like every day. But lately every time I open it it just stays on the very first opening page for 5, 10 minutes, and never loads. Every. Single. Time. I've tried restarting it. Restarting my phone, switching between wifi and data. Nothing works it just stays on that screen the whole time.

The app was perfectly fine up until this most recent update. Now you can't even use the app, it doesn't even go past the loading screen. It just spins and spins and spins. Ive restarted my phone, uninstalled and reinstalled the app, and still nothing. Expect us to pay our card bills on time but can't even get the app to load anymore. Thanks for breaking and ruining the app!

You changed it. I don't like change. Edit: It's been awhile, I've added 2 more cards, and have gotten used to the app, therefore have increased my rating by 2 stars. nothing I would change. out of all my credit card/ banking apps,this Capital One is 100% the best. So easy to use and absolutely love the home page upon opening I can see my cards and balances very clearly! Good job, Capital One!

I have always found this app really useful but since the last update I can barely open it. I live in a place with slower internet and it could be that the be version is so data heavy I can't use it here, but it is just stuck on the opening page with the logo or just the circle and never opens. But it always worked perfectly before. It seems like other people are also having this issue in the land of good internet. Hoping it can be fixed soon!!

title: Intuit Credit Karma
description:
Get everything you need to outsmart the system with Intuit Credit Karma:

‚Ä¢ Insights: View all your linked accounts in one place and uncover new ways to improve your finances.

‚Ä¢ Free credit monitoring ‚Äì Get alerted when your score changes, learn what affects your credit scores and get tips on how to improve.

‚Ä¢ Advanced Cards and Loan Marketplace:  You can find the best credit card and personal loan offers for you and see the specific credit limits, exact loan amounts and rates you could get approved for.

‚Ä¢ Net Worth: Track your net worth, monitor your categorized monthly cash flow, find opportunities to save money and learn how to navigate complex financial decisions.

‚Ä¢ Credit Builder*: Boost a low score by an average of 21 points in 4 days.*

‚Ä¢ Checking: Direct deposit your paycheck into your Credit Karma Money SpendTM  account*** and you could access your paycheck up to two days earlier.****

‚Ä¢ Drive Score: With a good drive score, you could save big on car insurance from a nationally trusted provider.

And much, much more. Just simply download the app to get started. 

DISCLOSURES

*Banking services provided by MVB Bank, Inc., Member FDIC. Maximum balance and transfer limits apply per account. Credit Builder is not provided by MVB Bank.

**A connected paycheck or one time direct deposit of $750 is required for activation. Credit Builder plan is serviced by Credit Karma Credit Builder and requires a line of credit and savings account provided by Cross River Bank, Member FDIC. Members with a TransUnion credit score of 619 or below who opened a Credit Builder plan and had it reported on their TransUnion report saw an average credit score increase of 21 points in 4 days of activating the plan.

***Banking services provided by MVB Bank, Inc., Member FDIC. Maximum balance and transfer limits apply.

****Early access to paycheck is compared to standard payroll electronic deposit and is dependent on and subject to payor submitting payroll information to the bank before release date. Payor may not submit paycheck early.

Some screen images are simulated.

Loan services offered through Credit Karma Offers, Inc., NMLS ID# 1628077 | Read licenses at https://www.creditkarma.com/about/loan-licenses | California loans arranged pursuant to a California Financing Law license.

Insurance services offered through Karma Insurance Services, LLC. CA resident license #0172748.

ELIGIBILITY AND ADDITIONAL DETAILS; PERSONAL LOAN INTEREST RATES AND FEES. You can see personal loan offers on the Credit Karma personal loan marketplace from third party advertisers from which Credit Karma receives compensation. Credit Karma members are shown offers with Outstanding Approval Odds** when available to them. Offers with Outstanding Approval Odds have rates that range from 5.4% APR to 35.99% APR with terms from 12 months to 7 years. Rates are subject to change without notice and are controlled by our third party advertisers, not Credit Karma. Depending on the particular lender, other fees may apply, such as origination fees or late payment fees. See the particular lender‚Äôs terms and conditions for additional details. All loan offers on Credit Karma require your application and approval by the lender. You may not qualify for a personal loan at all or you may not qualify for the lowest rates or the highest offer amounts.

PERSONAL LOAN REPAYMENT EXAMPLE. The following example assumes a $15,000 personal loan with a four year (48 month) term. For APRs ranging from 5.4% to 35.99%, monthly payments would range from $349 to $594. Assuming all of the 48 payments are made on-time, the total amount paid would range from $16,712 to $28,492.

summary: Credit scores and personalized money assistance
recentChanges:
Thanks for using Credit Karma!

Our app is regularly updated to make it easier for you to track your financial progress. This version includes a number of performance improvements and squashes a few small pesky bugs.
comments: I've used this app since 2017. I love the free app. the ability to check your scores and little words of encouragement that pop up when you make progress, and emails you get to improve, or look for a new card. I have had several loans thru this app giving recommendations and really love it! I wasn't a fan of the karma drive at first, but it did give me a great score on insurance! I received their Instant Karma feature when it first came out, which was awesome, but it's no longer available.

Similar to others, too many ads. it's clear that the driving purpose of this app is to get you to buy other products. I can easily find information about my credit score and get a loan, but finding information about my budget is gone. The convenience from mint that made it so helpful in budgeting, such as categories, setting goals, etc, are gone. Too bad because I used it for years. Deleting the app and my account and moving on.

One massive ad masquerading as an app. Mint had it's fair share of ads as well, but at least it was useful. Now, I no longer have my home screen widget that I had before, credit cards aren't linking correctly, I can't hide transactions and sub accounts from my net worth calculations, and I get way more spam then I did before. Way to screw up everything you touch, Intuit. All good in search of the all mighty dollar, I guess.

I was forced to switch to this from mint. I can't find where I can view my individual transactions (don't think it exists) and it's more ads than information. I get needing some ads to keep the app free to me, but I feel like I'm giving away personal information for companies to better target me and to get hardly anything in return. The one positive I can see is that I now see two credit scores instead of one. Not that helpful. Very disappointed.

I used to love this app, but it changed way too much. I don't know the score system they used to use because they no longer advertise it, so I assume they changed over to FICO scoring, which takes longer to update. I also noticed that their name changed to Intuit Credit Karma. It's too bad they ruined the app. Love this app! It lets me keep track of my credit score, and It gives me approval odds on credit cards and personal loans recommendations.

title: One - Mobile Banking
description:
One is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking services provided by Coastal Community Bank, Member FDIC. Approved accounts are FDIC insured up to $250,000 per depositor. One card is issued by Coastal Community Bank pursuant to licensing by Mastercard¬Æ International.

Join the millions of customers banking through One.

Debit Rewards, early pay, high-yield Savings.

EARN UP TO 5% CASH BACK ON SELECT BRANDS‚Ä†
Cash back can be earned through the One Rewards Program. See the One app for individual offer requirements. Terms apply.

3% CASH BACK AT WALMART‚Ä°
With eligible deposits, up to $50 every year.
To receive 3% cash back, eligible customers (at the time their purchase settles) must (a) have received $500 or more of eligible direct deposits in the previous month, or (b) have a total account balance of $5,000 or more. 3% cash back is limited to up to $50 per year and applies only to purchases made at U.S. Walmart locations and on Walmart.com. This promotion may not be combined with other One promotions that offer cash back on purchases at Walmart. Terms Apply.

SEND MONEY TO ANYONE ‚Äî EASILY¬ß
Send and receive money in seconds with One to One. Just search, select, and pay anyone.
Money sent through One to One can only be transferred to a One Deposit Account. If the recipient does not have an account, they must open one within 10 days of money being sent or it will be returned to the sender.

EARLY PAY å
Get paid up to 2 days early with direct deposit.
Direct deposit may be available up to 2 days in advance, but depends on when your employer sends paycheck data.

5.00% APY ON SAVINGSŒî
With eligible deposits up to $250,000. Plus, receive 1.00% APY on the rest of your Savings balances.
5.00% annual percentage yield (APY) applies to the primary Savings pocket and custom pockets of customers who either (i) received $500 or more of eligible direct deposits in the previous month or (ii) have a total daily account balance of $5,000 or more. Customers can also earn 5.00% APY on Pay Autosave and ONE@Work Save balances. In all instances 5.00% APY is limited to a total Savings balance of up to $250,000. All other Savings balances will earn 1.00% APY.

APYs are as of 9/28/2023, but may change at any time before or after account opening. Fees may reduce earnings on this account.

¬© Copyright 2024 One Finance, Inc. All third party products, names, logos, and brands are the trademarks or registered trademarks and property of their respective owners. Use of them herein is for identification purposes only and does not imply any ownership, affiliation, or endorsement. Additional terms may apply. To see full account and promotion terms and conditions, visit www.one.app/terms or call (855) 830-6200. 

Address:
P.O. BOX 513717
Los Angeles, CA 90051

summary: Debit Rewards, early pay, high-yield Savings.
comments: The new redesign is ok. It takes a few too many taps to get from the front page to being able to view debit/savings and actually do the things the app was built to do. I hate it when big UI updates are rolled out unexpectedly and it's especially jarring when it's something as personal and vital as banking. It makes me fear that policy changes will also be made very suddenly.

Wasn't going to review but the app has become terrible. Stays stuck on loading upon opening the app. I've Uninstalled and reinstalled a couple of times but doesn't fix. All of this started since the latest update. Nothing more disappointing than not being able to check your checking and savings. Not to mention being scammed recently and the dispute being closed within a day after an unauthorized withdrawal and obviously was not in my favor. No number to call, only a "chat". Going back to a bank.

Dont be mislead, there is no 'instant transfer' option. Its 1 to 3 business days. Unless you want to withdraw cash but it seems more complicated than casting a spell in Wiccan. L Update: well, the transfers aren't instant, but overnight is pretty close enough. And it was my employer w the shady wording. The app works really well and gives you alot of saving options. User interface might have gotten worse since the last update, but thats pretty much every popular app these days. Would recommend!

My hope is one day they get as good as simple was before they closed. I'm a legacy user so I have a better features than people who are brand new to the app which I appreciate being grandfathered in but I feel everyone should have access to the same features and perks I have. They're slowly bringing back certain features that they removed after the merger but it's getting back to where it was slowly. App can be glitchy at times. Like right now it's not letting me see any of my balance.

Edit. I got a review statement in my email and all it does is send me here to the Google Play store. I love this app, better than Bluebird by American Express. This app has a lot of great features. Not all things are intuitive but I eventually find what I am looking for. Love the 3% in my savings pockets. I haven't yet had an issue. Highly recommend. I'm on an old Android A02s.

title: Progressive
description:
Easy access to your insurance, whenever and wherever you need it.
 
Here are some things you can do with the Progressive App:
¬∑ View coverages, discounts, ID cards, documents, and policy details.
¬∑ Report and add photos to a claim.
¬∑ Pay your bill by credit card, debit card, or checking account.
¬∑ View your billing history and upcoming payment schedule.
¬∑ See your progress in Snapshot¬Æ.
¬∑ Quote or make a policy change.
¬∑ Request roadside assistance, exactly when you need it most.
¬∑ Take and submit photos of documents that we've requested from you.
¬∑ Get in touch with your agent and claims rep.
¬∑ Start an auto insurance quote‚Äîand then buy online.
 
Learn how we use your app permissions:
http://www.progressive.com/android-app-permissions/

summary: Insurance that's quick and easy to buy and use‚Äîanytime, anywhere.
recentChanges: We‚Äôve boosted performance and fixed some bugs.‚ÄØ
comments: The app often says I used my phone while driving when my phone is in my purse on my passenger seat for the whole ride. I wish they would improve that or stop tracking phone use. I'm tired of seeing that I used my phone 6 times when I didn't even look at it, much less touch it. Very frustrated. I think I might have 5 stars if the app worked right.

The Snapshot feature is a safety issue. It incentivizes breaking less, and now I second guess myself when I do require hard braking to avoid collisions. It also doesn't give you a chance to justify the false reports it gives, like it saying the driver used their phone if the passenger actually used their phone or if hard braking was used in the course of defensive driving to avoid a collision. It also doesn't let you go back very far in its history to change when you're a passenger.

The App should not record any "phone use" while someone is parked and stationary! Where's the logic in that? What's the point then in pulling over and STOPPING to use the phone if you're STILL going to be penalized? Might as well just use your phone while you're driving then. Instead of being rewarded for good driving habits the App makes sure you're penalized. Worst. App. Ever.

Constant battery drain. I have to force close it all the time, but then snapshot stops tracking. For example today, the dumb app ran for 9 hours straight and used 13% total battery. I drove for 30 minutes in total today. Such a joke. EDIT: still an issue. Sitting completely idle on the phone without any driving can use up to 8% in a day.

They cant/won't help you on the phone or in chat. If they can help, it's going to cost you. I even tried to stop automatic payments for one month, and they were going to charge me like 40 bucks total, and they said it may or may not stop my automatic payments anyways....if you are new to progressive, go with another company. This is my 3rd poor experience with them, 3 strikes.

summary: Our Chase Mobile App makes it easy for you to bank on the go 24/7.
recentChanges:
We're frequently updating the app in order to give you the best experience. Turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version.

This update includes:
‚Ä¢ Minor bug fixes and improvements.
comments: Mostly intuitive banking/credit card app. Easy to navigate. I absolutely HATE that they won't add in a running balance by transaction. Literally would be a 5* app if they added it in. Typical bank. Credit journey could be more informative; my number regularly fluctuates by 20-30 points but the explanations are always the same, but having the info on hand is good. Offers are ok. Haven't used the travel/points redemption area of the app yet.

Constantly crashes. Trying to make a payment is extremely frustrating. I can log in, get to the payment screen then the screen disappears. I then have to re-log in and try again and again and again. Absolutely HATE this app. Needs a LOT of work. Can't wait to pay this card off so I can cancel it and never have to deal with this garbage app again .

I do love the apps features, but it runs terribly slow and constantly crashes or freezes my phone during the login process. my phone can handle all the games I install, even really resource heavy ones so I am not sure why it's struggling to load so much but it's been this way the whole time I've had it, it's been years. I still love the features and how easy it makes things when it works but it's always a gamble if I'll even be able to log in without my phone freezing.

Want random, normal purchases to be flagged as fraudulent?? Download the Chase App! Hoping to miss out on hard-to-get releases because of dogshit fraud detection?? Chase Bank will mess that up for you too! Just check Google and you'll see that this has been an ongoing problem for Chase customers for 5+ years. Seems no one at Chase is smart enough to fix it! The best solution is closing your accounts - which I highly recommend.

Seriously regretting getting chase for the rewards points. The booking site is completely archaic. Very difficult to look through hotels, and absolutely no options to put in how much you would like to spend either above your points or if you would like to view hotels only with in your point range. The map refreshes anytime you move it so that you lose track of what it was you were looking at. And it list hotels aren't even available. Over all super frustrating.

title: Rocket Money - Bills & Budgets
description:
Join over 3.4 million members who trust Rocket Money to save more, spend less & see everything in the #1, all-in-one personal finance app.

Forbes: *"This App Will Save You Hundreds"*

**KEY FEATURES**

üí∞ Track and grow your net worth (New!)

üö´ Manage and cancel unwanted subscriptions

ü§ë Lower your bills and let Rocket Money negotiate on your behalf

üëÄ Keep track of your monthly bills and avoid overdrafts

üóíÔ∏è Create unlimited custom budgets (e.g. side projects, NFTs, etc.)

üìà Monitor your credit score

üí∏ Put your savings goals on autopilot

üîí Bank-level security and privacy

Save more, spend less, see everything, and take back control of your financial life.

**YOUR ALL-IN-ONE FINANCE APP**

Rocket Money (formerly Truebill) is your primary financial control center. The app automatically tracks different accounts and helps you navigate your finances each month in order to provide a clear picture of your income and expenses. Rocket Money finds recurring subscriptions and cancels them for you. It tracks all your bills and notifies you when they're soon to be due. Rocket Money can even negotiate bills on your behalf to get you much lower rates.

Use Rocket Money as a spending tracker to see where your money goes and how your net worth changes. Connect your investment and retirement accounts to view how your holdings have grown. Use Rocket Money to monitor your credit score and credit report to start thinking about  long-term financial goals. The app tracks all your bank, credit, and investment accounts so you don‚Äôt have to ‚Äì just link them once and let the app handle the rest.

**MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ALL IN ONE PLACE**

Managing your subscriptions has never been easier. Rocket Money gives you a clear picture of all recurring services, including forgotten subscriptions. Actively and easily monitor, manage and cancel ongoing subscriptions from one hub. Rocket Money will notify you when an existing subscription goes up in price and remind you when free trials are about to end. Rocket Money can sometimes get you a refund for subscriptions retroactively. Stop spending on subscriptions you no longer use and start tracking your money today.

**LOWER YOUR BILLS AND SPEND LESS EACH MONTH**

Stop overpaying and start saving for what truly matters.¬†Let Rocket Money lower your bills. Easily connect your bill by logging in or snapping a photo of it. Our expert negotiators get to work and lower your bills by either negotiating a better rate, or by getting 1-time credits applied to your account.  

**TRACK YOUR NET WORTH (NEW!)**

Are you interested in discovering your net worth? Now you can easily monitor your assets and debt with Rocket Money. Simply select your assets‚Äîlike NFTs, jewelry, fine art, cars, and homes‚Äîand let the app calculate the rest. Whether you need a pulse on your financial health for a loan or you‚Äôre just curious, figuring out your net worth has never been easier.

8455 Colesville Rd,
Silver Spring,
Maryland 20910, US

summary: Manage and cancel subscriptions, lower bills, track expenses, create budgets.
developerAddress:
8455 Colesville Rd,
Silver Spring,
Maryland 20910, US
recentChanges: Why don't scientists trust atoms but trust Rocket Money? Atoms make up everything, but Rocket Money helps you save anything! This release, we‚Äôve been tinkering & improving our atoms to get you your savings!
comments: For an app that wants to help you save money, it can do that for a VERY expensive price. I signed up through a referral link from a creator to get a week free trial, and after the week is up I got charged the annual price of the "monthly subscription" that you chose to pay. Good thing I lowered it from $10 a month default to $4 because I would've been out $120 immediately which not everyone can afford. Would not recommend this app until they charge you monthly like expected. I feel lied to.

Does not let me cancel some subscriptions I'd like to cancel. The option just simply isn't there. Apparently I'm paying for Netflix twice somehow and it's listed as A2A, but when I click the 3 dots on it, there is no option to cancel the subscription. And the chat for customer service is a joke. Can't actually chat for help. You can only select from a list of options.

Good money management and budgeting app. Love being able to see all my balances in one place and track recurring bills, however, could be better with biller connections for real due dates and amounts instead of projections based on past transactions, like Mint and Prism used to have. I think that Intuit is a big enough company to make this happen if a smaller app like prism could do it. Rocket has better monetization than mint or prism did and that feature would make me want to pay for premium.

As a retiree, I found Rocket Money helpful and it provides much understanding of my financial status. Everything I need to monitor is at my finger tips. I am kept informed of all activities prior to the transaction occurring. Easy transition between transactions and net worth. I find it easy to use and educational. I love it! ‚ù§Ô∏èüëç

It is super easy to use and I started saving money right from the start. I was able to open up a savings account and have what I save transfer in there . I used to just look at my statement online, never really questioning everything. Rocket money has me looking at my account and my transactions without all the stress and confusion. Knowing my money better helps me to save my money better. I really do love it!

recentChanges:
You spoke, we listened. In this release, we've made:

‚Ä¢Updates to our Pay Bills feature so it's easier to find and pay your Payees
‚Ä¢Minor enhancements and bug fixes
comments: The BoA app is really user friendly. There's a few things that are a little hard to find but after some searching, you can find your way. That's layout discrepancies, not functional. I find it helpful and easy to deposit checks too. And, if there's funny activity, it's laid out well to get you on track and secure. Security is not an issue as you are alerted if they find anything suspicious starting. Really is a friendly and useful app.

Taking it down a star or two as the app seems to digress with each update. Notable degradations include worse check-deposit imaging/reliability and deteriorated navigation/site architecture making it more difficult to find and execute tasks like Start ATM withdrawal. It has been a great app up until recently. No real technical issues or crashes.

Normally I would rate this one of five. But today I find that on my tablet and my phone, both android, I have wasted time to find out that I can't just easily look at the check images anymore. They are supposedly now in my gallery, and I checked my Google photos, but they're not there. Tried to edit the description of one check. It would not save. Strange note about a missing token for that transaction. Why did you change something that was working just fine before?

Used to be better. I only had to select a single option to pay off a credit card in the statements page from my checking account. They now make you jump through an ever more increasing number of hoops to do it. You now have to go to Pay & Transfer > Pay Bills > Add Payee > Add a Company, and then put in the credit account number and full amount to pay (you'll have to remember from memory or else it erases). This can eventually lead to some people being late in their credit card payments.

The "Mark As Paid‚Äú button on Bill Pay doesn't work well. It's too close to the "Pay" button so unless you have a stylus, which I don't it it keeps wanting to default to Pay button and going that route. I have a very hard getting it to mark as paid. Existing problem for years. This section needs to be reworked. Hoping the dev team sees this!

title: Google Pay: Save and Pay
description:
Important update:
The U.S. version of the standalone Google Pay app will no longer be available for use starting June 4, 2024.

If you use your Android phone to shop in stores where Google Pay is accepted, you can continue to tap to pay in stores with the Google Wallet app.

Here are the key changes and important dates:
As of Feb 22, 2024 you will no longer be able to view or activate deals in the app. If you previously activated a deal, and are still waiting for cash back, regular reward timelines apply. 

Changes to peer-to-peer payments: As of June 4, 2024, you will no longer be able to send, request or receive money from others through the U.S. version of the Google Pay app. 

Manage your Google Pay balance from the Google Pay app until June 4: You can use the U.S. version of the Google Pay app until June 4, 2024 to view and transfer your Google Pay balance to your bank account. You can continue to view and transfer your funds to your bank account after June 4, 2024 from the Google Pay website. 

If you have linked accounts on Google Pay to monitor your transactions and insights, you‚Äôll still be able to view your transactions on the Google Pay website in the transactions tab after June 4, 2024. If you wish to disconnect your accounts after June 4, 2024, you will be able to unlink them on the Google Pay website.

If you've used the Google Pay app in the US to send money with Wise from the US to India or Singapore, this feature and related transaction information will no longer be available in the app starting June 4, 2024. This does not impact your Wise account, which you can continue to access at wise.com.

Google Payment Corporation's Customer Service and Error Resolution Policy and applicable processes still apply to report unauthorized transactions related to Google Pay. If you have any further questions about your balance in the app, you can learn more about your Google Pay balance.

Still have questions? Head over to https://support.google.com/googlepay


*Payments processed by Google Payment Corp., a licensed money transmitter (NMLS ID: 911607). Licensed as a money transmitter by the NY State Dept. of Financial Services and to Transmit Money By Check, Draft or Money Order By The Department of Banking and Securities, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania. To learn more about Google Payments, visit the Google Payments Help Center.

recentChanges: We're giving the app a fresh new look. Enjoy the latest features and offers, from Groups experiences to convenient card payments!
comments: If I could rate 10 stars I would. I can't say enough good things about Cash App! I use it for all my banking needs. I get paid 3 days early, I save money with roundups, my ATM fees are reimbursed and now I have $50 free overdraft protection! Love this app more than PayPal or Venmo. So easy to send and receive $. No waiting for verification or anything. And almost everyone is on cash app. Super easy to look people up whether or not they are on your contact list

To view your card info you have to open up chrome and go to autofill. If you want to adjust payment settings you need to go the Google app instead. But if you want to tap-to-pay you use google wallet, but if you want to view your transactions you have to use this pointless app. Google took the concept of uncomplicated, convenient, and all in one place, and said "let's do the polar opposite!" Half of google searches are just people troubleshooting stupid issues that Google itself created

I've been using it for a while. Really convenient not needing to dig for my wallet everytime. My only wish is that there was some way to get digital receipts when you pay, and they appear in the wallet/pay app. Pretty sure the checkout retail needs to update in order to achieve this, but you'd think saving paper receipts would be good motivation. Still... It's a great app.

Overall, this is a really good app. Especially since the last update that requires users to unlock to use Google Pay. I wish they made access to the wallet a little easier. Currently, pay and insights are on a menu at the bottom but to access wallet you have to go to the menu at the top right, then open wallet. Wallet really needs to be at the bottom where Pay and Insights are located.

Definitely a nice feature if you forget your wallet,purse,debit card,etc., and absolutely have to have gas or something important! Only thing I really wish you could add as a feature would be that it would show you the balance/amount able to spend on each of the attached card accounts. Just a thought, idk if that's something you could even implement into the app, but I'm sure I'm not the only person who would benefit from a feature like that.

title: testerup - earn money
description:
Earn money as an online tester? As often and whenever you want?

Join Germany's largest platform for paid online jobs and join over 3,000,000 online testers.

After signing up for free, you'll immediately have access to countless app tests, game tests, online surveys, and other product tests.

- Earn over $800 directly after download, whether on the go or from the comfort of your home, maximum flexibility guaranteed.
- Choose from the largest assortment in the US area, orders that fit you exactly.
- You will be regularly invited to the latest product, website, and app tests.
- Orders with multi goals allow you to achieve higher earnings through continuous testing.
- Fast and secure payout: Get paid within 24 hours.
- Upgrade to a premium tester and earn exclusive access to higher-paying assignments.
- Tested, Verified, Recommended! We value authenticity and trustworthiness. Not for nothing we are recommended by Verbraucherschutz.de. In addition, testerup is certified with the T√úV - eKomi rating of 4.3/5.

comments: EDIT : I was able to cash out and it processed pretty fast. I was surprised. I'm $4 away from the cash out minimum, and my check list keeps glitching. I past the requirement on one game, but it didn't check it off. And I downloaded a new game and passed the requirement and haven't gotten it. Plus there is no way to let the app know when you have a problem with an offer. UPDATE I am at the cash out point, but it want me to do a facial recognition and it wont accept it or somthing.

The variety of available games is better than most other play to earn services. I haven't hit the minimum payout yet, which I believe is a little high (the reason for 4 stars instead of 5), but I have heard of others cashing out. You just have to make sure you read the instructions for each game, some have different requirements. For some you have to finish all the goals, others you don't. Some have different limits on how long you have to finish quests. Overall I'm happy with it.

Played the Monopoly all the way, it stopped tracking it partway through, tried to cash out, won't cash out, tried township, began tracking it but then stopped. The whole thing is a waste of time and a scam. They just want information, your information, so they can sell it. You get no compensation for anything. And all the games want you to do is purchase, purchase, purchase. If you're evaluating things you shouldn't need to purchase. I give it a zero if that was an option

I do love the concept of this app, is better (so far) than any of the other earth money apps I've tried. The goals for each game are realistic, and achievable. I would like checking my progress on the games to simpler, however. Other than that I'd recommend it to friend and family. I would've given four our five stars, but haven't completed all of my goals yet\cashed out yet. But that's because I've only been using the app for a few weeks now.

I didn't play because after install and email sign up, it's pretty clear that games within app require tracking install...not worth any pay out for me personally . Also if forgetting to click "agree to terms" the prompt text refers to the terms & conditions as "hint". I'll update this review if I begin to receive spam email. Many of these types of apps just seem to be predator apps on folks needing groceries or rent funds.

comments: so many hidden fees despite my account meets criteria. FED should close this pos bank down. I'm closing my account after wasting years with this pos bank. It is really hard to find your credit card history transaction and such. I hate this app and bank. So many clicks to see all your "deposits" in an account. Need to move the "filter" option to each account tab once selected for easy access. Unable to log one the first time, always take 2-3 times to log on.

I like to pay down my CC statement balance a couple chunks at a time, to keep my balance low and not impact my credit score. I really don't like how this app doesn't show the remaining statement balance, they just show the last statement balance. Makes it more complicated to figure out what the remaining statement balance is. The Amex app makes this super easy. It's a simple formula, please just add it to the app as a visual aid and a selectable payment option.

Horrible. Used to work fine for years yet lately for months now, wow, took many attempts to finally got in, always showed all kind of error message, recently said something like lets verify you in different way, really bad. I try to avoid using the app but I have to when depositing checks and it is sp frustrated. It is a big bank so we would expect good technologies but not so much at all.

For the last five or six months this app has become extremely difficult with the login process. EVERYTIME I log on it does the same thing. I go through the ENTIRE logon process only for it to make me start all over once I reach the six digit code that is texts my phone. Today it took me six tries before I could get to the home menu. Extremely frustrating to have to go through this EACH damn time. Fix it!

Now, it's October and the latest "features" introduced include not being able to transfer funds between accounts, view notifications, or pay bills. Last month, the new feature was an inability to take a photo of a check when using the online deposit feature. Wow! Reverse improvements. Here's an idea: howabout working harder on functionality. Maybe?
